channel.title: Quest tab help
channel.description:
Heyy
well ive added my own quests onto the quest tab and i have a command so when u type:
::quest5 it goes to the quest 5 menu
i would like to know how i can click on the quest in the quest tab and make it show the same menu
rather then typing ::quest5 i want to go to the quest tab and click on the quest
so does any 1 know how to do this please
will rep if i can
